short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A beautiful way to save and manage your favorite URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beautiful Bookmarks transforms the way you organize and access your favorite websites. This sleek extension offers a visual, grid-based bookmark manager with powerful features for modern browsing. Your privacy is our priority. Rest assured that no data will be collected, stored or sold.

Key Features:

Visual Grid Layout - Bookmarks are displayed as clean, organized favicon grids for quick visual recognition
Tab Group Integration - Create Chrome tab groups directly from your bookmarks with automatic color coding
Custom Icons - Personalize your bookmarks with custom icons or use website favicons
Smart Organization - Group related bookmarks together for better organization
Quick Search - Instantly find bookmarks with the built-in search feature
Backup & Import - Easily backup your bookmarks to CSV and import them across devices
One-Click Access - Add the current page to your bookmarks with a single click
Clean Interface - Modern, minimalist design that's easy to navigate

Perfect for:

Professionals managing multiple work-related websites
Students organizing research and learning resources
Anyone who wants a more visual and organized browsing experience

Beautiful Bookmarks combines functionality with visual appeal to make bookmark management both efficient and enjoyable. Keep your browsing organized and your favorite sites just a click away.
Note: The extension requires permissions to manage tabs and tab groups to provide its full functionality.
